## MoUSD\_LIQUIDATION\_RESERVE variable

Amount of MoUSD that's reserved for compensating the liquidator of a Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MoUSD_LIQUIDATION_RESERVE: Decimal
```
